underlying_goal: To add epoch support to the prompt selection pipeline for improved statistical power, ensuring changes are backward-compatible with the existing cache.
primary_success: Claude successfully implemented epoch support while ensuring backward compatibility with existing cache files by making the new `_eN` suffix conditional on `epochs > 1`.
brief_summary: Continuing from the previous session, Claude implemented the plan to add epoch support to the prompt selection pipeline. This involved modifying configuration files, the runner script, and the caching logic to include an `_eN` suffix in cache filenames for multi-epoch runs, while maintaining backward compatibility. After verification, the changes were committed.
